title: Mage

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, read your Spellbook, learning each ability that was used on the previous night. Choose one ability from the list to gain one charge of, storing it until you use it.
- At night, you may cast a spell, astrally using an ability you stored and consuming its charge.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain necessary attributes when using abilities. (Ex: You become roleblock immune if you use a roleblocking ability.)
- When a player is hanged and you have their ability stored, their ability becomes a Cantrip - you now have an infinite number of charges for that ability.
- You cannot gain certain gamebreaking abilities if the host determines it as such.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill a player, save a player from death (including via roleblocks or redirection), and gain a Cantrip.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny

desc:
Post 4371
*The librarian's eyes were transfixed on the pages of an archived manuscript as he absentmindedly deferred his custodial duties to a younger college girl who had been hired two weeks ago. The man's old eyes ran down the lengths of each page, and when he could not find what he had lost, he discretely burned the page with his fingertips. He opened a drawer to dump the ashes into - no, that drawer was full of ashes already - the next drawer down full of pens and scattered office supplies would suffice.*
